featured.text: Initial contact is made via e-mail, with subsequent communication usually by phone.
She didn’t play on the court after the initial injury.
My initial offer was turned down politely.
When the main tree dies, the sprouts are then free to grow as full trees, forming a “fairy ring” of trees around the initial tree.

other.text: The result is an unfortunate tendency for people making initial contact—in a job interview, for example—to stare fixedly at the other individual.
Norwegians were prohibited from wearing any 38 of their national unity, such as buttons with the initials of their king.

definition.en_def: Existing or occurring at the beginning; first.
definition.example: The initial step in the process is to gather all necessary materials.
